alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 12:34PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dare County through 115 PM EDT... At 1234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Hatteras Ferry Terminal, or 8 miles south of Frisco, moving north at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Frisco, Buxton, Salvo, Avon, Waves, Rodanthe, Hatteras Island Fishing Pier, Hatteras Ferry Terminal, Avon Pier and Cape Hatteras Lighthouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
